page.title: 05CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content:
{Children's Games}
There are lots of games to play indoors and out. I play{marbles}in Spring and Summer,{conkers}in Autumn and{French Skipping}in Winter. When both my brother and I haven't got anything to do we either play{snooker} or{swingball.}On warm Summer evenings I play in the woods. On cold, wet evenings I play{board games.}After school I play my musical instruments. I have a piano, recorder, clarinet and treble recorder. When everyone else is in the road on their bikes I play on my bike. When it's been raining we like riding through a large puddle.
